sense.def:
Expense
je znesek, ki ga je treba plačati za nekaj.

seg.quote: ...the roads they're building at vast expense.

sense.def:
One's expenses
je denar, ki ga potrošimo, ko počnemo nekaj, kar je povezano z delom in za kar nam pozneje plačajo.

Če nekaj storimo
at someone's expense
, nam nekdo za tisto da denar.

seg.quote: He circulated the document at his own expense.

sense.def:
Če razdremo šalo
at someone's expense
, to storimo zato, da je nekdo videti smešen.

Če nekaj dosežemo
at someone's expense
, to storimo tako, da nekomu škodujemo.

seg.quote: They increase their own income at the expense of the rural masses.
